title: Amid Violence, Mexican Voters Go To The Polls
teaser: Protesters burned ballots and election materials in a rocky start to voting in elections already marred by the murders of candidates and campaign officials. Reporter Carrie Kahn speaks with NPR's Arun Rath from Mexico City, where she has been talking to voters.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
